Popular.description: Cappuccino is a traditional Italian coffee drink made with equal parts espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam. It has a strong espresso flavor, balanced by the creamy texture of the steamed milk and the light, airy foam on top. Cappuccinos are often garnished with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon.
Popular.title: Cappoccino

Popular.description: Espresso is a concentrated form of coffee served in small, strong shots and is the base for many coffee drinks. It is made by forcing a small amount of nearly boiling water through finely-ground coffee beans under high pressure. The result is a rich, robust flavor with a thick, creamy layer on top called crema.
Popular.title: Espersso

Popular.title: Affagato

Items.description: A seasonal favorite, this comforting latte combines the richness of espresso with the creamy sweetness of pumpkin spice, milk, and a touch of cinnamon. Perfect for autumn or any cozy moment.
Items.extra: Espresso, steamed milk, pumpkin spice syrup, cinnamon.
Items.title: Pumpkin Latte

Items.description: A bold espresso drink topped with a small amount of milk foam. Perfect for those who love the intensity of espresso but want a smoother finish.
Items.title: Macchiato

Items.description: A vibrant and healthy option, the Matcha Latte combines high-quality matcha green tea with steamed milk for a creamy and refreshing beverage, offering a unique twist on traditional lattes.
Items.extra: Matcha powder, steamed milk, a touch of sweetener (optional)
Items.title: Matcha Latte

Items.description: A balanced blend of espresso and warm milk, the cortado delivers a smooth coffee experience with just the right level of intensity. A great pick for coffee lovers who prefer a little less milk.
Items.title: Cortado
